title: Berkeley Haas offers graduate certificate in sustainable business
author: Kim Girard
excerpt:
Berkeley Haas this week launched a new certificate that will equip MBA students to become sustainability leaders. The Michaels Graduate Certificate in Sustainable Business is named in honor of the parents of Charlie Michaels, BS 78.
